p: Twenty-seven compounds were identified from the aroma of fresh black morel, comprised 98.82% of the total aromas, and 3-methyl-butanal (11.49%), benzene acetaldehyde (24.31%), and 1-octen-3-ol (34.40%) were the main components ( Figure 2(A)). Nineteen compounds were identified from the lipophilic extracts of fresh black morel, comprised 97.58% of the total extracts, and linoleic acid was the main component (77.37%).
